title: S12 Ep117: A Demonic Haunting & The Legend of Cropsey
itunes:title: A Demonic Haunting & The Legend of Cropsey
description:
Julia and Phil Siracusa

The Siracusa's have led a life filled with the strange and unusual that culminated with the frightening realization that they were living in a Hellsmouth crawling with supernatural activity. This is their story and how it led Julia to investigate one of the strangest legends in Staten Island, NY. The Legend of Cropsey.

https://www.amazon.com/Horsefly-Chronicles-Demonic-Haunting/dp/1499562489

https://www.facebook.com/julia.siracusa.9
